```{r eval=T, echo=F}
fileInput("file", "Upload the File")
```

```{r eval=T, echo=F}
renderTable({
    table <- read.table(file_to_read$datapath, sep=",", header=T)
    input.table <- as.data.frame(table)
    input.table %>% head(5)
})
```
